title: Wrong labels in Update Test Suite dialog
description: The labels in the Update Test Suite dialog are incorrect. The label 'Test Classes to be included' should have a space between 'Test' and 'Classes'. The status line should mention 'types' instead of 'methods' being selected. Additionally, the action name should be 'Test Suite' instead of 'TestSuite' for clarity.
OB: The labels in the Update Test Suite dialog are incorrect.
EB: The label 'Test Classes to be included' is written as 'TestClasses' (missing space). The status line mentions 'methods' being selected instead of 'types'. The action name is written as 'TestSuite' instead of 'Test Suite'.
SR: Fix the labels in the Update Test Suite dialog to display the correct wording. Update the label 'Test Classes to be included' to 'Test Classes' (with a space). Change the status line to mention 'types' instead of 'methods' being selected. Update the action name to 'Test Suite' for clarity.
